title: The perfect apple crumble
ingredients: ['7 large green apples', '100g caster sugar', '1 tsp cinnamon (ground)', '125g plain flour', '175g dark brown sugar', '75g rolled oats', '50g desiccated coconut', '1 tbsp cinnamon (ground)', '2 tsp nutmeg (ground)', '150g butter (melted)', '2 tsp vanilla extract']
